What we did Working principles

Hypotheses #11

We believe if we can flip the narrative on risk to talk about it as an enabler, and demonstrate how it’s helped other areas as opposed to something dry that must be done

We'll see people recognising the benefits of doing this and more actively engage and embrace risk

We’ll know this is true when people are coming to us for help and support and compliance with the risk process increases

Considerations

  • If we don’t do this then no matter what we do people won’t be aware of it or come to us, we’d have to constantly go to them
